name: Friction in the dark
description:
Friction in the dark is about Santa being lost after burning his last candle.

He needs your help and his hand hand pressed light to find his way back to his Xmas tree.

Use the mouse wheel (spin) to get a tiny bit of light. Avoid the dangerous rocks.

made in roughly 2 * 3 hours ;-)
